title: Sarah & The Cowboy: A collection of Mail Order Bride & Christian Romance
description: Sarah decides to grant her grandfather's dying wish, to deliver a love letter to a long lost girlfriend. She journeys to the farming community only to a handsome cowboy named Rex. He assists her on her quest to find the whereabouts of her grandfather's lost love only to discover that the two may be just what each other need...he's been wanting to meet a strong, Christian woman for a long time and she has only dreamed about dating a cowboy with integrity...and when they find out what is in her grandfather's letter they find out that love can truly be magical.
author: Victoria Morgan
